channel.title: toshiba on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in toshiba on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Great fun playing badminton and chatting
item.description: 01:56 Saturday 16 February 2019 JST Tomoko invited me to join 今さん and peeps for badminton. They play monthly at the Kawasaki something something Center, down 区役所どり from JR Kawasaki station. I had so much fun that I did not notice a blood blister formed and burst while playing! I gave the raquet back and was like, “oh hang on; lemme wash that blood off of there” haha oops. I knew it was a bit sore, but did not noticed I had worn all the way through the skin.

item.title: pics of Toshiba Muza bridge
item.description: 09:22 Tuesday 16 January 2018 JST These are from May and July 2017

item.title: Four lessons at Toshiba
item.description: ##18:19 Wednesday 12 November 2014 JST## Before the lesson started, there was an announcement on PA system. I couldn’t really understand it,but they said “so don’t use the elevators or escalators.” Chapters were with Mutsumi, Mari, Manami, and Rin. Mutsumi explained that the van der graffe generator had been used a lot more than usual, so got a bit overheated, apparently setting off an alarm.
